scripts.build:frontend-main: cd frontends/frontend-main && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.build:gate-app: cd frontends/frontend-gate-app && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.build:guardian-app: cd frontends/frontend-guardian-app && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.build:user-manual: cd frontends/user-manual && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.dev:full: pm2 delete all 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.dev:backend: docker compose up backend supabase-db redis
scripts.dev:all-frontends: docker compose up frontend-main user-manual frontend-gate-app frontend-guardian-app
scripts.restart:backend: lsof -ti:3000,4000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 stop ante-backend 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 start ecosystem.minimal.config.js --only ante-backend
scripts.restart:frontend: lsof -ti:9000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 stop ante-frontend-main 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 start ecosystem.minimal.config.js --only ante-frontend-main
scripts.restart:both: lsof -ti:3000,4000,9000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 stop ante-backend ante-frontend-main 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 start ecosystem.minimal.config.js
scripts.restart:school: lsof -ti:9002 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 stop ante-gate-app 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only ante-gate-app
scripts.restart:guardian: lsof -ti:9003 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 stop ante-guardian-app 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only ante-guardian-app
scripts.supabase:dashboard: echo 'Supabase Dashboard: https://supabase.com/dashboard/project/ramamglzyiejlznfnngc' && open https://supabase.com/dashboard/project/ramamglzyiejlznfnngc 2>/dev/null || xdg-open https://supabase.com/dashboard/project/ramamglzyiejlznfnngc 2>/dev/null || echo 'Open https://supabase.com/dashboard/project/ramamglzyiejlznfnngc manually'
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
